channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 141 Best Prime Day Deals of 2025—Every Gadget Has Been Tested By Us
item.description: We review products year-round and spend weeks evaluating Amazon Prime Day deals to pick the best bargains on quality gadgets.

item.title: Meet the America Party, Elon Musk's Harebrained Third-Party Scheme
item.description: Elon Musk is attempting to manifest his “America Party” into existence. But who will join him?

item.description: We’ve tested all the top slates, from Apple’s iPads to Android and Windows devices, and rounded up our favorites.

item.title: The tech behind Rivian’s 2026 Quad-Motor truck and SUV — and that kick turn
item.description: Rivian has opened customer orders for its second-generation quad-motor R1S and R1T EVs.
